Description:
AL AMAL BUSINESS SOLUTIONS is seeking a qualified and experienced Mechanic in the Logistics department for an Ultra Luxury Hotel in Saudi Arabia. The successful candidate will be responsible for maintaining the hotel fleet and support vehicles in peak condition, ensuring they remain safe and reliable. Reporting to the Logistics Manager, the Mechanic will play a key role in maintaining the smooth operations of the hotel.Conduct regular maintenance check-ups on the hotel's vehicles to ensure they remain safe and reliable.
Conduct routine inspections, diagnose mechanical issues and efficiently repair any vehicle that breaks down.
Identify and order necessary parts and supplies for repairs.
Communicate effectively with the Logistics Manager to ensure the smooth running of day-to-day operations.
Liaise with the procurement department for parts, supplies, and equipment.
Maintain accurate records of vehicle inventory and maintenance history.
Provide support to the hotel's drivers and maximize fleet performance.Job Details
